comment.author: 67715478@N00
comment._content: Opening of Messrs Thomas and De Cunha's new bath establishment on the Waterfall Road, Alexandra Hotel. Present for the occasion: Governor Ibbetson, Recorder Sir Benson Maxwell and Lady Maxwell together with Miss and Mr. Maxwell, Resident Councillor and Miss Macpherson, Miss Earl, Major Carter and most of the officers of H.H. 20th Regt. M.N.I., the Bishop of Attnlie, Chaplain Mackay, Capt. Protherue A.D.C., Major and Mrs Smart, Mr. Watson, Mr. and Mrs. Scott of Ayer Rajah and family, Mr. Bain, Mr. and Mrs. Anthony and family, Mr. Es Chasserain, Mrs. and Miss Waller, the Messrs Waller, the Misses Loureire, Mr. D. Brown, Mr. Mahomed Noordin, Dr. Anderson, Capt. Eaglesham, Mr. and Mrs. Plunket, Dr. and Mrs Fuston, Miss De Lug, Miss Smith, Miss Anderson, Mr. Aitken, Mr. Campion, Mr Symons, Dr. Greene, Mr. Hasche, Othmansaw Merican, Chow Pan, Chow Sen, Sin Tat, Sek Chuan, Boon Keng, Lee Yap, Ah Thye, Tean Tek, &c., &c., &c., &c. ... [Pinang Gazette and Straits Chronicle, Saturday 5 September 1856, Pg 4]
